derivation.yuyuan_name: mid 17th cent.: from Abnaki segankw; variants occur in many other American Indian dialects

entry.def: A skunk is a small black and white animal which releases an unpleasant smelling liquid if it is frightened or attacked. Skunks live in America.
Skunk is a type of powerful, strong-smelling marijuana.

means.word_mean: 1. a person who is deemed to be despicable or contemptible;

sentences.sentence: "the British call a contemptible person a `git'"

means.word_mean: 2. a defeat in a game where one side fails to score
4. American musteline mammal typically ejecting an intensely malodorous fluid when startled; in some classifications put in a separate subfamily Mephitinae
